items.title: Best Dividend Aristocrats For May 2025
items.description: Dividend Aristocrats lag behind the S&P 500 in April, but 25 are undervalued with 10% returns potential. Click to read about promising Aristocrats.

items.title: Royal Caribbean outlook, UPS job cuts, Sherwin-Williams earnings
items.description: Yahoo Finance host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute, including Royal Caribbean's (RCL) latest full-year outlook figures, United Parcel Service (UPS) plans to cut 20,000 jobs in this year as part of a cost-cutting initiative, and Sherwin-Williams (SHW) posting a first quarter earnings beat. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

items.title: PPG 1Q Earnings, Revenue Fall; Maintains Full-Year Adjusted EPS Outlook

items.title: Top Stock Movers Now: Honeywell, Sherwin-Williams, Regeneron, and More
items.description: Major U.S. stock indexes were higher at midday as markets awaited more information about potential White House tariff deals.

items.title: Sherwin-Williams Stock Rises as Firm Benefits From Higher Prices, Lower Costs
items.description: Sherwin-Williams exceeded earnings expectations on higher prices and lower costs, although revenue missed estimates.
